title: Child care means business
creator_credit: Louise Leitch, Elena Guest and Commonwealth Department of Human Services and Health
brief_description: A panel of employers debate employer sponsored child care, examining economic arguments together with philosophical and practical issues. Andrew Olle hosts a panel including small, medium and big business along with leading work and family strategists.
creator_credit_for_label: Louise Leitch, Elena Guest and Commonwealth Department of Human Services and Health
description: A panel of employers debate employer sponsored child care, examining economic arguments together with philosophical and practical issues. Andrew Olle hosts a panel including small, medium and big business along with leading work and family strategists.
